official_title: To amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act to designate the Perdido River in the States of Florida and Alabama for potential addition to the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System.

summary.text: Designates the Perdido River in Florida and Alabama for study as a potential addition to the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System.

titles.title: To amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act to designate the Perdido River in the States of Florida and Alabama for potential addition to the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System.
